vision_analysis.question_text: Which of the following have you personally done in the last two years (if any)?
clickable_elements: Been self-employed or worked in paid employment for an organisation in the tourism sector
Worked as a volunteer for an organisation in the tourism sector (e.g. for an event, or ongoing)
Worked for another organisation that provides services for visitors, or services for tourism businesses
Been involved in developing an activity or attraction for locals and visitors (e.g. an event, a new cycle/walking trail, a museum)
Hosted visitors you know in your home (such as friends or visiting family members)
Provided paid accommodation for visitors in your home/a property you own (e.g. through Airbnb, Bachcare, or similar)
Recommended studying or working in tourism to someone you know
Made an investment in an organisation that provides services for visitors, or services for tourism businesses
Participated in a public consultation or planning process affecting tourism (e.g. making a submission, attending a public meeting)
Taken part in a local tourism activity/visited a local tourism attraction
Taken part in a tourism activity elsewhere domestically/visited a tourism attraction elsewhere domestically
Recommended a local or domestic tourism activity or attraction to someone you know
Interacted with someone you don't know who was visiting your region – outside of work activity (e.g. providing directions, taking photos for them)
Studied tourism or taken tourism-related classes (at high school, university or other tertiary institute)
